1-national-information-technology-author.feedbackInstructions: Download the consultation document from the NITA website. Submit your response as an email attachment in Microsoft Word format to comments@nita.gov.gh. Include a completed response cover sheet (available on Page 4 of the consultation document). All responses will be treated as non-confidential.

2-emerging-technologies-bill.feedbackInstructions: Download draft bill and Public Comment Declaration Form from Ministry website. Submit completed forms via provided email addresses specific to each bill.

3-postal-courier-logistics-services-comm.feedbackInstructions: Download draft bill and Public Comment Declaration Form from Ministry website. Submit completed forms via provided email addresses specific to each bill.

4-electronic-transactions-amendment-bill.feedbackInstructions: Download the consultation document from the NITA website. Submit your response as an email attachment in Microsoft Word format to comments@nita.gov.gh. Include a completed response cover sheet (available on Page 4 of the consultation document). All responses will be treated as non-confidential.

5-electronic-communications-amendment-bi.feedbackInstructions: Submit responses electronically to info@nca.org.gh. Respondents are encouraged to specify the sections of the Bill they support or oppose and to provide suggestions for improvement. All responses will be treated as non-confidential.

6-misinformation-disinformation-hate-spe.feedbackInstructions: Download draft bill and Public Comment Declaration Form from Ministry website. Submit completed forms via provided email addresses. Also available via Google Docs for commenting.

7-ghana-india-kofi-annan-centre-of-excel.feedbackInstructions: Download draft bill and Public Comment Declaration Form from Ministry website. Submit completed forms via provided email addresses specific to each bill.

8-digital-economy-and-innovation-develop.feedbackInstructions: Download draft bill and Public Comment Declaration Form from Ministry website. Submit completed forms via provided email addresses specific to each bill.

9-ghana-meteorological-authority-amendme.feedbackInstructions: Download draft bill and Public Comment Declaration Form from Ministry website. Submit completed forms via provided email addresses specific to each bill.

12-data-harmonisation-bill.feedbackInstructions: Download the consultation document from the NITA website. Submit your response as an email attachment in Microsoft Word format to comments@nita.gov.gh. Include a completed response cover sheet (available on Page 4 of the consultation document). All responses will be treated as non-confidential.

13-cyber-security-amendment-bill.feedbackInstructions: Download the Draft Bill (PDF) and the Format for Submitting Comments from the CSA website. Submit your feedback to submit.feedback@csa.gov.gh in accordance with the specified format. All stakeholders, including Cybersecurity Professionals, Cybersecurity Service Providers, Civil Society Organisations, and the General Public, are encouraged to provide feedback.

14-national-communications-authority-ame.feedbackInstructions: Submit responses electronically to info@nca.org.gh. Respondents are encouraged to specify the sections of the Bill they support or oppose and to provide suggestions for improvement. All responses will be treated as non-confidential.
